entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
